Key Match Events: Giannis Antetokounmpo chased LeBron James and emphatically rejected the four-time MVP's layup at the rim.
Post-Match Reflections: Bucks coach Doc Rivers experimented with his rotation by keeping Giannis Antetokounmpo on the bench for the entire third period.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Giannis Antetokounmpo's pick-and-roll action with Damian Lillard looked smoother than last season.
Bucks center Brook Lopez looked slow against Anthony Davis and Giannis Antetokounmpo often covered for him.
Others: Giannis Antetokounmpo finished with 20 points, seven rebounds, two assists and two blocks in the game.
